description:
# Create a Customer

The Customer master is at the heart of your sales transactions. Customers are linked in Quotations, Sales Orders, Invoices, and Payments. Customers can be either numbered or identified by name (you would typically do this based on the number of customers you have).

In order to setup an error free integration, following details must be setup while setting up or creating a new customer:
 - Customer’s address
 - Customer's Preferred language
name: Create a Customer with Proper Address and Language
title: Set Up Customers with Proper Address and Language
